details:
Drupal core uses the third-party PEAR Archive\_Tar library. This
library has released a security update which impacts some Drupal
configurations. Refer to [CVE-2018-1000888](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2018-1000888) for details. Also a possible
regression caused by [CVE-2019-6339](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2019-6339) is fixed.


For Debian 8 Jessie, this problem has been fixed in version
7.32-1+deb8u15.


We recommend that you upgrade your drupal7 packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
